Current approach consultation collaboration among perinatal care provider , include nurse-midwives , obstetrician , perinatologist , fragment care result communication error maternal dissatisfaction . The CARE study test innovative interdisciplinary consult visit improve communication , teamwork , maternal satisfaction , perinatal outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: Perinatal outcome United States rank many developed country . National organization , American College Obstetricians Gynecologists , call woman utilize level provider maternity service meet personal medical need . This level approach care require consultation collaboration among provider ensure woman receive appropriate service . While national international organization call team-based maternity care , current model fragment service , increase risk communication error . Women feel disenfranchised model meet need opt beneficial service altogether . Currently , evidence effective interdisciplinary model maternity care . The Collaboration Antepartum Risk Evaluation ( CARE ) study use randomize design systematically test effect interdisciplinary consults woman provider . The two aim study : ( 1 ) evaluate effect collaborative v individual consults participant outcome include communication quality ( use Communication Assessment Tool , team version ) , maternal satisfaction ( use modify Satisfaction Prenatal Care measure ) , semi-structured interview , adherence develop plan care , perinatal outcome ; ( 2 ) evaluate effect CARE clinic provider use Communication Assessment Tool- team version , Agency Healthcare Research Quality ( AHRQ ) Team Strategies Tools Enhance Performance Patient Safety ( TeamSTEPPS ) questionnaire , semi-structured interview . The CARE study provide valuable information effective model patient-centered maternity care . The AHRQ K08 allow Dr. Philippi implement CARE study facilitate growth national leader midwifery health service research .
DOC.criteria: Adult pregnant woman receive prenatal care VUSN NurseMidwifery Faculty Practice . Gestational age pregnancy 440 week Needs consultation perinatologist one follow reason : Prior pregnancy congenital abnormality History fetal demise > 20 week History preterm labor previous pregnancy Current maternal drug alcohol abuse Controlled maternal condition ( e.g . thyroid disorder ) Mild abnormality fetus placenta ultrasound Idiopathic thrombocytopenia pregnancy Can attend collaborative care clinic Unable give consent research participation include age < 18 impaired mental function Urgent medical condition require immediate assessment include : ectopic pregnancy vaginal bleeding Medical condition outside scope VUSN midwifery guideline include : Chronic maternal condition require specialist involvement include : HIV , epilepsy , uncontrolled asthma , liver , renal , cardiac disease . Multiple gestation > 2 previous cesarean birth Rh isoimmunization Incompetent cervix Major fetal placenta abnormality
